page.title: 12INDUSTRY ON S.BANK OF R.AIRE
page.content: Knottingley's main industries are {glass}(see p.13)&{bearings},{iron- {founding}also{ship building}(see p.14> Oldest industry in Knottingley is Kings Mills, mentioned in first {Domesday Book}, milling local wheat grown on the magnesian lime- stone soil in Yorks,Lincs& Notts.Its disused{water wheels}are still there. A{maggot farm}on S.side of the marsh buys condemned animals,cuts them up then sets flies to lay their eggs, which turn into angling maggots. As it is such a smelly business it has to be done in a remote place.Fyba Pots make plastic, and peat{plant pots}. Midland Diving Services do any underwater work like welding,surveying bridges & dams. A{tar}works & a{chemical}(mainly para- cresol)works perfume the air.Power station{fly ash}is processed as filler powder for insecticides,glues&plastics
